TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISharePointProjectItemTypeProvider

summary.span: 提供自定义 SharePoint 项目项类型的定义。

span.span: Provides the definition of a custom SharePoint project item type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口以定义 SharePoint 项目项的自定义类型。Implement the interface to define a custom type of SharePoint project item. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[定义自定义 SharePoint 项目项类型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/defining-custom-sharepoint-project-item-types)和[如何:定义 SharePoint 项目项类型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type)。For more information, see [Defining Custom SharePoint Project Item Types](/visualstudio/sharepoint/defining-custom-sharepoint-project-item-types) and [How to: Define a SharePoint Project Item Type](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-define-a-sharepoint-project-item-type). 实现此接口的类必须包括 和要由项目系统发现的。Classes that implement this interface must include the and the to be discovered by the project system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeType(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeDefinition typeDefinition) cil managed

param.name: typeDefinition
param.span: 要初始化的项目项类型定义。

span.span: A project item type definition to initialize.

summary.span: 由项目调用，用于初始化 SharePoint 项目项类型的实例。

span.span: Called by projects to initialize an instance of a SharePoint project item type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用后将冻结该实例, 这意味着无法更改其属性。The instance will be frozen after this method call which means that its properties cannot be changed.
